summary: All previously blocking inconsistencies (split math, signup bonus trigger, credit backing/withdrawability, Score pool liability, identity binding, attribution anchoring/idempotency, and NOWPayments async+security) are addressed in a way that is implementable and financially reconcilable.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Revenue-share math inconsistent vs existing governed 3-way split (referrer cut applied then 3-way split example changed effective shares)
previous_issues_status.notes: FR-3.2 explicitly chooses the model: referrer is a 4th slice taken off the top, and the 3-way split is redefined as % of the remainder when a referrer is present; Section 9 example matches and adds a conservation invariant with deterministic rounding (foundation absorbs remainder).

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Signup bonus trigger contradictory (could imply two $5 bonuses) vs one-bonus rule
previous_issues_status.notes: FR-2.1 clarifies first qualifying action (dNFT OR first purchase, whichever first) and FR-2.2 enforces one bonus per referee with idempotency/uniqueness; user journey now aligns.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Payout flow not reconcilable: unclear what credits represent, which are withdrawable, and how NOWPayments is funded/backed
previous_issues_status.notes: FR-6.4 defines withdrawable vs non-withdrawable credit classes via pool tags; FR-6.5 introduces a treasury reserve backing model and a solvency invariant tying withdrawable balances to treasury:payout_reserve; FR-6.6 makes payout an atomic burn + treasury debit.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Score-weighted rewards pool liability not bounded / unclear funding source and withdrawability
previous_issues_status.notes: FR-5.2/5.3 hard-cap pool size to min(config, available balance) and require a dedicated funding account/pool with enforcement; FR-5.4 makes Score rewards non-withdrawable, preventing treasury drain.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Score identity resolution undefined and Sybil via wallet splitting not addressed
previous_issues_status.notes: FR-5.1 defines canonical identifier as EVM address, requires wallet linking with signature verification, and accrues per-account across linked wallets; FR-5.5 adds per-wallet and per-account minimum thresholds to mitigate wallet-splitting/dust.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: 12-month attribution window lacked precise anchor and idempotent finalization behavior
previous_issues_status.notes: FR-3.3 anchors expiry to referral_registrations.created_at and specifies the eligibility check at finalization; FR-3.4 adds idempotency keyed by (inference_charge_id, rule_version) to prevent replay/backfill double-pay.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: NOWPayments payout execution mixed synchronous latency targets and lacked idempotency/webhook verification/fee handling
previous_issues_status.notes: FR-6.7 makes payout execution async via BullMQ with idempotency key; FR-6.8 requires HMAC verification for callbacks; FR-6.9 specifies fee accounting and gross vs net; NFR-4 explicitly excludes provider latency from API p99.
